import React from "react" import { useState } from "react" import {provideDetails} from "../utils" const AdditionalDetails = ({newUser}) => { const [realname, setRealname] = useState() const [address, setAddress] = useState() const [realNameSubmit, setRealNameSubmit] = useState() const submitHandler = async(e)=> { e.preventDefault() console.log(realname) console.log(address) await provideDetails(realname,address,newUser) setRealNameSubmit(realname) } return( <> {realNameSubmit ? <> : <>

} ) } export default AdditionalDetails
